snippet: An Ebola-infected Texas nurse who travelled to Ohio over the weekend to plan for her wedding may have been ill as early as Friday, a spokesman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: CDC Says Ebola-Infected Nurse Vinson's Illness May Have Begun Friday
headline.main: CDC Says Ebola-Infected Nurse Vinson's Illness May Have Begun Friday

lead_paragraph: An Ebola-infected Texas nurse who travelled to Ohio over the weekend to plan for her wedding may have been ill as early as Friday, a spokesman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Thursday.
